pages.text: I've finally broken the $(thing)Arcane Barrier$() and dropped down into the Beneath.$(br2)But it is darker than the abyss down here, and I can feel that every monster in the Beneath has their eyes on me as I enter.
I still need to gather valuable minerals like $(thing)mythril$() here but I can't be too greedy or else I'll be swamped by more monsters than I can handle.
